trans-unit.source: The current trends of how employees work, how they are productive, and the means to do their work is fast changing.
trans-unit.target: The current trends of how employees work, how they are productive, and the means to do their work is fast changing.

trans-unit.source: Employees are bringing in their personal devices to work.
trans-unit.target: Employees are bringing in their personal devices to work.

trans-unit.source: On these personal devices, they have apps that they use in their personal, digital lives.
trans-unit.target: On these personal devices, they have apps that they use in their personal, digital lives.

trans-unit.source: And they’re accustomed to the freedom and to the capabilities that this brings to them.
trans-unit.target: And they’re accustomed to the freedom and to the capabilities that this brings to them.

trans-unit.source: They want to use these same applications at work, and they want to have the same flexibility that they have in their personal digital lives in their work life.
trans-unit.target: They want to use these same applications at work, and they want to have the same flexibility that they have in their personal digital lives in their work life.

trans-unit.source: Today’s corporate employees expect to work from any location, on devices of their choice and seamlessly connect and access business applications.
trans-unit.target: Today’s corporate employees expect to work from any location, on devices of their choice and seamlessly connect and access business applications.

trans-unit.source: With this flexibility of enabling users to work where, when, and how they want comes increased risk.
trans-unit.target: With this flexibility of enabling users to work where, when, and how they want comes increased risk.

trans-unit.source: Plenty of data point to these devices being stolen, misplaced, or lost.
trans-unit.target: Plenty of data point to these devices being stolen, misplaced, or lost.

trans-unit.source: On many of these smartphones and tablets there’s an incredible amount of sensitive and confidential customer and corporate content on it.
trans-unit.target: On many of these smartphones and tablets there’s an incredible amount of sensitive and confidential customer and corporate content on it.

trans-unit.source: This is the fine balance that IT Architects, Security Specialists, and IT Administrators are trying to maintain.
trans-unit.target: This is the fine balance that IT Architects, Security Specialists, and IT Administrators are trying to maintain.

trans-unit.source: It’s this balance between enabling users to be productive on all the devices that they love, while delivering the appropriate level of security and protection for the corporate content that resides on these devices.
trans-unit.target: It’s this balance between enabling users to be productive on all the devices that they love, while delivering the appropriate level of security and protection for the corporate content that resides on these devices.
